concept.title: Trash
concept.shortdesc: The Trash destination discards all records. Use the Trash destination as a visual representation of records discarded from the pipeline. Or you might use the Trash destination during development as a placeholder for a different destination.

conbody.p: TrashoverviewdestinationsTrashFor example, the following pipeline uses the Stream Selector to route data to the Kafka Producer and Hadoop FS targets based on different conditions. The Stream Selector routes all records that are not included in either of the other conditions to the Trash destination. Retake screenshot with Hadoop FS

When you use a Trash destination, you can use data preview to view the data routed to the destination, monitor statistics for the destination, and configure alerts for the destination and the incoming stream.
The Trash destination has no configuration options. To use the Trash destination in a pipeline, simply add the stage and connect it to the pipeline.
